content: Has anyone seen the mobile app (ios) forgetting the currently signed-in user? We're running a small pilot and my testers have been reporting this pretty consistently over the past 24hrs. They log in, start using the app, reopen the app later and it's back at the setup screen.
@Ott we have not seen other similar reports. That's certainly a surprising problem. Can you start a thread about this in #mobile? I'm sure the mobile team will want to investigate this with you.
